title: AnalyticalMethod
description: The <font color="#4f81bd">AnalyticalMethod</font> provides the name, and published citation, of the analytical method used in an analytical session.

methodName.title: methodName
methodName.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">methodName:AnalyticalMethodTerm</font> contains a term from a controlled vocabulary that describes an analytical method used in a session (e.g., XRF mass spectrometry, ICPMS, SHRIMP geochronology).

citation.title: citation
citation.description: The <font color="#4f81bd">citation</font> property is an association between an <font color="#4f81bd">AnalyticalMethod</font> and a <font color="#4f81bd">CIT:CI_Citation</font> describing a published description of a particular analytical method (e.g., a standard operating procedure document).
